verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they had come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>"Take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> every <S%H2145>male,<s%> one by <S%H1538>one;<s%>

from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who are able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> You and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them by their <S%H6635>divisions.<s%>
With you there shall be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4294>tribe;<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house.<s%>
These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> who shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> with <S%H7205>you:<s%> Of Reuben: <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur.<s%>
Of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai.<s%>
Of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab.<s%>
Of <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar.<s%>
Of <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> Of <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%> Of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur.<s%>
Of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni.<s%>
Of <S%H1835>Dan:<s%> <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai.<s%>
Of <S%H836>Asher:<s%> <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran.<s%>
Of <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel.<s%>
Of <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%> <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan.<s%>"

These are those who <S%H7148>were<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> they were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> <S%H1992>of<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> these <S%H582>men<s%> who are <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

They <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> and they declared their <S%H3205>ancestry<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> one by <S%H1538>one.<s%>
As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> one by <S%H1538>one,<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>it,<s%> according to the number of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> one by <S%H1538>one,<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> were <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> were <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them,<s%> of the tribe of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

These are those who were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> being <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> they were <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for his <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house.<s%>

So all those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> all who were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
even all those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>
But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> after the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Only the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> you shall not <S%H6485>number,<s%> neither shall you <S%H5375>take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

but <S%H6485>appoint<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> over the <S%H4908>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> and over all its <S%H3627>furnishings,<s%> and over all that belongs to <S%H5375>it.<s%> They shall carry the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and all its <S%H3627>furnishings;<s%> and they shall take <S%H8334>care<s%> of <S%H2583>it,<s%> and shall encamp <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H4908>it.<s%>

When the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> is to <S%H5265>move,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall take it <S%H3381>down;<s%> and when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> is to be set <S%H2583>up,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall set it <S%H6965>up.<s%> The <S%H2114>stranger<s%> who comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall pitch their <S%H2583>tents,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H1714>standard,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions.<s%>

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> that there may be no <S%H7110>wrath<s%> on the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H8104>be<s%> <S%H4931>responsible<s%> for the <S%H4908>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>Testimony.<s%>"
Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%> According to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so they <S%H6213>did.<s%>
